title: Cryptoverse: Bored bitcoin seeks direction after big bang
description: The crypto leader has largely shuttled between $56,000 and $63,000 so far in the second half of the year - a contrast to the first six months when it jumped 45%, propelled by the launch of U.S. exchange-traded funds (ETFs) tracking its spot price.
content: Bitcoin has been distinctly listless in the past three months after starting the year with a bang.
cleaned_content: bitcoin has been distinctly listless in the past three months after starting the year with a bang
